## Set up

Load the libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

Load the data
```{r}
timeline = read_csv("timeline.csv")
```

## Bar Plot

Format the data
```{r}
dates = timeline %>%
  select(applied) %>%
  count(applied) %>%
  mutate(applied = mdy(applied)) %>%
  arrange(applied) %>%
  mutate(n = cumsum(n))
```

Plot
```{r}
ggplot(data = dates,
       aes(x = applied,
           y = n)) +
  geom_line(size = 1) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Job Applications",
       y = "# Applications Submitted") +
  theme(axis.title.x = element_blank())
```
